parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false" no-lock="false">
<entity name="contact">
<attribute name="firstname"/>
<attribute name="fullname"/>
<attribute name="emailaddress1"/>
<attribute name="lastname"/>
<order attribute="cid_contacttype" descending="false"/>
<order attribute="fullname" descending="false"/>
<attribute name="contactid"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
<condition attribute="emailaddress1" operator="not-null"/>
<condition attribute="parentcustomerid" operator="eq" value="@{triggerBody()?['AccountId']}" />
<condition attribute="cid_contacttype" operator="eq" value="100000001"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: @{variables('TestSubjectText')}TDG Online - CID: Reassignment of @{outputs('GetPrimary')?['body/firstname']} @{outputs('GetPrimary')?['body/lastname']} as the new Primary Admin for the @{outputs('Get_Parent_account_name')?['body/ovs_legalname']} organization.
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
@{variables('TestingText')}@{outputs('StandardSalutation')}
                                                                                                 
You have been assigned as the Primary Admin for the @{outputs('Get_Parent_account_name')?['body/ovs_legalname']} organization within the CID Data Platform. The previous Primary Admin,  @{outputs('Get_Secondary')?['body/firstname']} @{outputs('Get_Secondary')?['body/lastname']} has been re-assigned as a Secondary Admin.

If these updates are not correct, then please adjust them accordingly in the CID Data Platform.

Regards,


Transport Canada - CID Support Team

@{outputs('English-EmailFooter')}

</filter>

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: @{variables('TestSubjectText')}TDG Online - CID: Request to deactivate a Site.
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
@{variables('TestingText')}@{outputs('StandardSalutation')}

Another organization is blocked within the TDG Online CID platform from adding a site as your organization has Site ID @{triggerBody()?['SiteId']} at that same location.

If that Site is part of a Sale or Transfer, or it should not be an active Site for your organization, or it should no longer have a status indicating that your organization still owns it, then please use the 'Deactivate Site' side-menu option to deactivate it. The other organization will be then be notified and then they will be able to proceed.

Regards,


Transport Canada - CID Support Team

@{outputs('English-EmailFooter')}

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: @{variables('FrenchTestSubjectText')}TDG Online - CID: Request to deactivate a Site.
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
@{variables('FrenchTestingText')}@{outputs('FrenchStandardSalutation')}

La plateforme TMD en ligne – BDIC empêche une autre organisation d’ajouter un site, car votre organisation possède l’ID de site @{triggerBody()?['SiteId']} au même endroit.

Si ce site fait partie d’une vente ou d’un transfert, s’il ne doit pas être un site actif pour votre organisation ou s’il ne doit plus avoir de statut indiquant que votre organisation en est toujours propriétaire, veuillez utiliser l’option « Désactiver le site » du menu latéral pour le désactiver. L’autre organisation en sera alors informée et pourra poursuivre son action.


Salutations,


Équipe de soutien de la BDIC de Transports Canada

@{outputs('French-EmailFooter')}
